page.title: 03Expenditure in Sussex
page.content: This district is affluent relative to the nation and many families have disposable income for expensive leisure activities. Growing numbers own or rent{video-recorders.}Pubs and restaurants are busy. Many families run{2 cars}although one is often provided by an employer. Almost every family owns a{television}(and additional portable tv's are common). Many families take annual{continental {holidays}({Spain}is a common choice). Expensive{cameras}and{hi-fi}are part of most families expenditure often purchased through extensive use of{ {credit cards.}Building work such as {remodelled kitchens,bathrooms & {extensions}is popular with 'new' fittings such as {bidets}&{ {dishwashers.} A smaller number of families pay for{ {private medicine & education}.
